title: Fortinet Warns of Critical Vulnerability in FortiManager Under Active Exploitation
description: Fortinet has confirmed details of a critical security flaw impacting FortiManager that has come under active exploitation in the wild. Tracked as CVE-2024-47575 (CVSS score: 9.8), the vulnerability is also known as FortiJump and is rooted in the FortiGate to FortiManager (FGFM) protocol. "A missing authentication for critical function vulnerability [CWE-306] in FortiManager fgfmd daemon may
